description:
A basic field repair kit for all types of minor repairs to tents, sleeping pads, rainwear, backpacks, boots, and more.

  • Packed in an expandable water-resistant tube
  • Seam Grip (7g tube)
  • 1 Clear patch (7.5cm)
  • 1 Black patch (7.5cm)
  • Contains a field repair guide
  • Dimensions are 8.5 x 3cm
name: Gear Aid Seam Grip+WP Field Repair Kit
